original_title: April Wine: I Like to Rock - Live in London
overview: The first ever DVD release featuring classic archive material from Canada's most popular Rock band. I Like To Rock contains a full show the band played at London's Hammersmith Odeon during their 1981 tour of the UK. title: April Wine: I Like to Rock - Live in London
